trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> object looks for the resources of the app's default culture in the main assembly or in a satellite assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>对象查找在主要的程序集或附属程序集的应用程序的默认区域性的资源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: The UltimateResourceFallbackLocation enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor to specify whether a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> object retrieves the resources of the app's default culture from the main app assembly (the default), or from a satellite assembly.
trans-unit.target: 与使用 UltimateResourceFallbackLocation 枚举<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation%29?displayProperty=fullName>构造函数来指定是否<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>对象在从主应用程序集 （默认值），或附属程序集检索应用程序的默认区域性的资源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> </xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In a localized application, the resources of the default culture are used if no culture-specific resources are found after using the resource fallback process.
trans-unit.target: 在本地化应用程序中，如果没有特定于区域性的找到资源使用资源回退进程后，则使用默认区域性的资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Resource Fallback Process" section in [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"资源回退进程"一节[打包和部署资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value of MainAssembly or no value to the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute and resource manager cannot load a resource set that belongs to the default culture, it throws a <xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值为 MainAssembly 或没有到值<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>属性和资源管理器无法加载所属的默认区域性的资源集，它将引发<xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException>异常。</xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException> </xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value of Satellite to the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> and resource manager cannot load a resource set that belongs to the default culture, it throws a <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的附属到值<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>和资源管理器无法加载所属的默认区域性的资源集，它将引发<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>异常。</xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> </xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Fallback resources are located in the main assembly.
trans-unit.target: 回退资源位于主程序集。

trans-unit.source: Fallback resources are located in a satellite assembly.
trans-unit.target: 回退资源位于附属程序集。
